CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c<=0,(AcctSeed__Balance__c>0)),0.00, IF(AND(30>=TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c,TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c>0,(AcctSeed__Balance__c>0)), AcctSeed__Balance__c , IF(AND(60>=TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c,TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c>0,(AcctSeed__Balance__c>0)),0.00, IF(AND(90>=TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c,TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c>0,(AcctSeed__Balance__c>0)),0.00, IF(AND(TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date__c>90,(AcctSeed__Balance__c>0)),0.00, 0.00)))))
CustomField.label: AR 1-30
